JComponentActionSetBackground - Class in info.monitorenter.gui.chart.events
Performs the action of setting the background color (JComponent.setBackground(java.awt.Color)} of a JComponent.

Create an Action that accesses the JComponent and identifies itself with the given action String.
JComponentActionSetCustomBackground - Class in info.monitorenter.gui.chart.events
